Text: Re PUC Inquiring About Enron Turnback of CA Gas Customers Cc This is the first I have heard of this any chance of finding the name for this site Roger

Re CPUC inquiry re gas customer turnbacks Cc about Oct th I returned a call to Kathy Pantolo sp at X according to my phone log As I recall the reason for her calling the office was that the Sept invoice had just arrived and she questioned NGI price The scope of our conversation was limited to gas prices and how high they were this is the only conversation I can recall having with Providence Hospital I hope this sheds a little more light on this issue Roger
